rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer with natural lighting and minimalistic design. Incorporates eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open space integrated with dining area, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample sunlight and ventilation. Utilizes recycled wood and low-VOC paints.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for a modern aesthetic with energy-efficient LED lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact eco-friendly kitchen with energy-star rated appliances and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Utility/Balcony
rooms.description: A small balcony area offering garden views and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional and water-efficient bathroom layout utilizing low-flow fixtures.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious, south-facing bedroom adhering to Vastu principles. Features a private balcony and energy-efficient lighting.

rooms.name: Bedroom Two
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with minimal eco-friendly decor and built-in storage solutions.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space optimized for natural light from the west-facing window, incorporating smart design elements for functionality and privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-equipped bathroom with water-saving fixtures and sustainable materials.

openings.features: floor-to-ceiling west-facing window maximizing natural light, adhering to Vastu guidelines
private and sound-insulated entrance for quiet work environment

rooms.name: loft-bedroom
rooms.description: A creative, multi-purpose space with eco-friendly insulation and integrated storage. Designed to be flexible for additional living or office space.

openings.features: floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring light penetration and ventilation
